$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|I want to do something for Fjorm
to cheer her up! What do you think
I should do?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|...Give it up already, ya brat. For an
older sibling, just knowing your little
sister is safe and sound is...enough.$k$p$Sbs1000|
